assets.name: 650pc GalaxyMap
assets.description: 3D map of dust and star density within a 650pc region. The models are rednered without depth culling so that interior regions can be viewed. To change this uncheck 'Disable Depth Test' in each models Renderable menu. These meshes come from Kevin Jardine's Galaxy Map (https://twitter.com/galaxy_map) with original data sources here: https://gruze.org/sn/sources.pdf A rendering can be seen here: https://gruze.org/galaxymap/quartet/wallpapers/wallpaper_0650pc.png

author.name: Deion Desir/Jackie Faherty via Kevin Jardine

assets.name: Neil Armstrong Spacesuit 3D model
assets.description: This 3D model of Neil Armstrong's spacesuit comes from the Smithsonian's 3D Digitization library. This asset contains the model placed at Little West crater near the Apollo 11 landing site, specifically fitted for use with the 'LRO NAC Apollo 11' height layer for the moon. This height layer is only available if OpenSpace is launched with the 'apollo' scene, or it can be downloaded from the 'Additional Datasets' section of the install page on openspaceproject.com

assets.name: Space Weather Bastille Day
assets.description: This asset contains a volume rendering and fieldline rendering of the Bastille Day space weather event. The data in this asset is time-coded to July 2000, if you want to see it, the 'MAS Fiedlines' scene graph node has a button called 'Jump to Start of Sequence' that will set the time in OpenSpace to where data is available

assets.name: Milky Way streams
assets.description: This asset contains data for streams of stars in the Milky Way. Prepared for OpenSpace with this Jupyter Notebook: https://github.com/OpenSpace/scripts/blob/master/jupyter-notebooks/mwstreams/MilkyWayStreams.ipynb original data from https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2021MNRAS.501.2279V/abstract

assets.name: Historical ISS Trail
assets.description: This asset contains a historical trail of the ISS with data ranging from 1998 NOV 19 to 2005 JAN 01. For performance reasons the asset file only shows the last two months of trail. This can be edited to show the desired timeframe. Historical data is from Celestrak archives.

assets.name: NYC 3D Model
assets.description: This asset contains 3d obj files for the building in NYC (Manhattan). The data was originally acquired from: NYC DOITT https://www1.nyc.gov/site/doitt/initiatives/3d-building.page. More information available at author url.

assets.name: Spitzer
assets.description: 3D model and trail for Spitzer Space Telescope

assets.name: Hubble
assets.description: 3D model and trail for Hubble Space Telescope

assets.name: Extragalactic
assets.description: Extragalactic data sets for GAMA and Parkes-H1 Zone of Avoidance (HIZOA) surveys.

assets.name: Close Approaches 2021
assets.description: Trails for the ten closest approach NEOs of 2021 from JPL Horizions (as of 05/28)
assets.author: Zach Shaffer

assets.name: Nodelines
assets.description: Use a csv file to create lines between nodes in the scene.

profiles.name: Empty profile
profiles.description: An almost empty scene, that is very close to the minimal scene and still render something

recordings.name: Orbiting the Earth
recordings.description: Just a single rotation around the Earth

videos.name: Insight landing sequence
videos.description: Shows the sequence of the landing of Insight
